recipesJson.name: Buttah
recipesJson.author: SixStrings952
recipesJson.description:
"Buttah":
  
A simple 4-flavoring recipe for the best buttery sugar cookies you've ever eaten...er, vaped!
 
Can be vaped fresh, but really shines after 7-14 day steep. High VG(75%) mix.
  
Please dont use this recipe for commercial gain nor post to any other sites. Thank you & enjoy!
  
#E-Juice Makers

reviews.text: Mixed it up based on the picture, the name and review.  The ingredients give me pause and I don't think the recipe will create my newbie idea of 'buttah" (fluffy, warm American definition of "biscuit" i.e. not a sweet cookie).  SNV gives me a cookie.  I'm steeping but I don't believe this is going to be a biscuit which is what I about the recipe would be if I went by the picture and the title. Obviously anybody with experience would know by the recipes that this is a Sweet Mix. So my comment are for new people like me
This shit is amazing, death by diacetyl and I love it. Great job!!!!
